name: wake (itch) (riningear)
description:
first twine project, done as an experiment in storytelling and storytelling. based on reality. extremely short, less than 15 min or so to find all the slides even w/ a replay.  thanks for clicking through. 

Q&A 

Q: the f**k is this green s**t 
A: yes. the colors are horrible at first, that is the intent. it's a dream.

Q: what is this about
A: you're not gonna play until I say it so it's sleep paralysis 

Q: this is so edgy
A: yeah well sleep paralysis just goes and does that so 

Q: is this safe for work
A: yeah it's PG-13 at worst. tv-safe. etc.

Q: is t-
A: you could have played the game by now. it's stupidly short. go do it and leave a comment if you have any questions.
